nodes.text: Level 5127 was a level on the metropolitan world of Coruscant, so named because it was located five thousand, one hundred, and twenty-seven levels from the planet's ground. Galactic City comprised the entirety of Level 5127. In the waning years of the Galactic Republic, it was the highest surface level on Coruscant. During the reign of the Galactic Empire, Level 5127 notably hosted the COMPNOR arcology.
In the 2016 reference book Star Wars: Complete Locations, Coruscant is erroneously mentioned as having a Level 5217 instead of a Level 5127. This was corrected in later releases.
